channel.title: Issues With Nvidia Optimus
channel.description: I've got a laptop that uses an Nvidia 310M/Intel hybrid graphics. It's an interesting (and ridiculously flawed) system. One of the flaws is that, when my computer auto-switches from GPU to GPU, my screen brightness gets changed. I can't figure out how to get this to stop, as it seems to be part of the Nvidia drivers, Nvidia's control panel is the GUI equivalent of the Tunguska event.
